title: Metformin reduces new-onset atrial fibrillation risk rather than atrial fibrillation burden in type 2 diabetes patients: A case-control study
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Chongxia Zhong, Jian Bai, Xinhong Qu, Yihai Liu, Zhu Li, Han Hao, Shiyang Qiao, Zhe Zhang, Xiaoying Xu, Jiayi Si, Wei Xu, Biao Xu, Lina Kang
